lead_paragraph: Pamela Jelimo, an 18-year-old Kenyan, upstaged Usain Bolt and his victory in the 100 meters at the Weltklasse meet in Zurich. Jelimo won the women’s 800 in 1 minute 54.01 seconds, the fastest time in more than two decades and the third fastest in history.
